website_summaries.verdict: A well-made chaise lounge that looks great and fits homes with modern decor. Makes a nice accent or focal piece for living rooms and bedrooms.
pros: Features an attractive sloping arm and accent rivets that give it an elegant appearance
Wood frame and fabric feel durable
Foam padding in the seat is supportive
cons: Screw holes that don't line up properly add to this problem

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful chaise, great accent piece
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to go in our bedroom. It has a nice, sleek look and was super easy to put together. It’s firm, but we prefer that. I’m 5’ 10” and when I sit on it, my feet don’t hang off the end. It’s a good size. Bonus: this same chaise is over $400 on other sites, so it was a steal buying from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Pushing Petals

customer_reviews.title: Needs some improvements
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the fabric and everything is good. Comfort is decent but not amazing. I’d give it 4 stars, but whoever did the hardware and drilling on this needs some lessons. The hole that the bolts go through is about 3-4x bigger than the bolt itself. And only 1mm bigger than the flat washer. So if you tighten it too much the flat washer breaks into the too-large hole
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful once assembled.
customer_reviews.text: The package it came in was unraveling and assembly took quite some time to get the screws aligned properly. Despite those two qualms, the couch is great. It's a bit on the smaller side. I'd recommend putting in all screws at 80% and adjusting as needed before screwing in tight. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. The color, fabric, and style are all nice, but the manufacturing is defective. The bolt holes in the back "wing" piece don't line up with the bolt holes in the seat, so you cannot attach them. I got a replacement one and the replacement has exactly the same problem. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Argonaut

customer_reviews.title: Buyer tested, cat approved.
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a process to get everything screwed in correctly. The directions say screw everything in 80% before fully tightening, but it ended up being more like 10% at a time so the holes don't misalign. But it's all assembled now, it is sturdy and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chaise Lounge!
customer_reviews.text: We really love this Chaise lounge that we ordered. Its a well built item that is very sturdy, yet comfortable. It looks amazing in our master bedroom. The color is is spot on perfect as well. Should make a really nice addition to a family room, bedroom or living room. Glad we found it on Amazon as well!!
customer_reviews.author: M.G.

customer_reviews.title: Defective!!!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! It looked so pretty but couldn’t assemble because hole were in the wrong spot. Definitely look for a different chair
customer_reviews.author: Meliss0804

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this chair! It fits my space perfectly and was exactly what I needed! My husband put it together in about 5 minutes and it’s very comfortable for me. It’s not plush or cushy so if you’re looking for that you’ll want to choose something else. I prefer something more firm to sit on so it’s perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Esther

customer_reviews.title: Shoddy manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: Decent build quality, but you get what you pay for. Or rather, what you don't pay for. Which was apparently accurate manufacturing. None of the damn holes for the wing lined up for the screws. Otherwise nice looking and respectable size for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Capnwinky

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great; Assembly Could Be Improved
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It looks so nice in my bedroom. My only complaint at this point is that some of the pre drilled holes don't line up which made assembly difficult. Others posted about this issue as well. We figured it out but it seems like a simple fix for the manufacturer. Otherwise, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mom1203

customer_reviews.title: Top cat Sly approved
customer_reviews.text: Grandmother assembled and ‘top cat’ Sly approved. Pleased as Punch. Good quality. Comfort, size, and design are perfect for us. Assembly went well...followed the instructions. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: GKM

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and so far find it to be comfortable. Not all the holes are drilled but wasn’t a problem for us we just did it.
customer_reviews.author: Blondiedone

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking piece
customer_reviews.text: Really really firm. Not as gray as the picture shows. It’s actually a light beige.
customer_reviews.author: Richard  Stephan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and great price. Looks so great in my room!
customer_reviews.author: Tara lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Chaise
customer_reviews.text: This is an beautiful chaise. It is firm so if that’s what you like then this is the chaise for you. The instructions were clear and concise.
customer_reviews.author: Tev

product_meta.title: Rosevera Deedee Chaise Lounge, Beige
product_meta.description: Color:BeigeIntroducing this graceful Chaise Lounge, this beautifully handcrafted chaise is ideal for your living room or master bedroom and this lovely chaise is sophisticated yet versatile. The distinctive sloping arm and back supporting panel complete this luxury statement that will bring in many compliments. It is the perfect addition to your home.
feature_bullets: Constructed of solid wood frame and base, constructed of solid wood frame and base
Nail head trim outlining Back and base of Chaise
High- Quality upholstery that is Sturdy, durable and easy to clean
Fire resistant, Animal- friendly and does not contain Toxic materials, high-density Eco-Safe foam padded seats and Back for comfort and long-term
Easy assembly. 2 year . Overall size: 32'' H x 68.5'' W x 35'' D; Seat dimensions: 57" W x 26'' D

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars26 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
